dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI-CARLA is a dataset built from the CARLA simulator using a vehicle with sensors identical to the KITTI dataset, aimed at testing approaches of semantic segmentation and odometry in synthetic data and comparing with real data.
dcterms:title: KITTI-CARLA

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA is an open-source simulator for autonomous vehicles that allows simulating multiple sensors, including LiDAR and cameras, in a realistic urban environment.
dcterms:title: CARLA
